info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued September 24 at 1:15PM CDT until September 24 at 4:45PM CDT by NWS Shreveport LA
info.description:
FFWSHV
The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a
* Flash Flood Warning for... Western Union County in south central Arkansas... Columbia County in southwestern Arkansas... Eastern Lafayette County in southwestern Arkansas... Northeastern Bossier Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Claiborne Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Webster Parish in northwestern Louisiana...
* Until 445 PM CDT.
* At 115 PM CDT, Doppler radar and automated rain gauges indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area. Between 2 and in excess of 5 inches of rain have fallen since this morning. Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 3 inches, with isolated higher amounts, are possible in the warned area through late afternoon. Given that the grounds are saturated and this additional rain will quickly run off, flash flooding is expected to begin shortly.
HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding.
SOURCE...Radar and automated gauges.
IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses.
* Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... El Dorado, Minden, Magnolia, Springhill, Homer, Smackover, Stamps, Waldo, Norphlet, Junction City, McNeil, Haynesville, Cullen, Cotton Valley, Sarepta, Bradley, Taylor, Calion, Emerson and Buckner.
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.

parameter.value: NWS: FLASH FLOOD WARNING this area til 4:45 PM CDT. Avoid flooded areas.

National Weather Service: A FLASH FLOOD WARNING is in effect for this area until 4:45 PM CDT. This is a dangerous and life-threatening situation. Do not attempt to travel unless you are fleeing an area subject to flooding or under an evacuation order.

area.areaDesc: Columbia, AR; Lafayette, AR; Union, AR; Bossier, LA; Claiborne, LA; Webster, LA

parameter.value: SNM: AVISO DE INUNDACIONES REPENTINAS hasta 4:45 PM CDT. Evite areas inundadas.

Servicio Nacional de Meteorologia: AVISO DE INUNDACIONES REPENTINAS en efecto para esta area hasta las 4:45 PM CDT. Esta es una situacion peligrosa y amenaza la vida. No intente viajar a menos que sea para abandonar un area propensa a inundaciones o bajo una orden de desalojo.

area.areaDesc: Columbia, AR; Lafayette, AR; Union, AR; Bossier, LA; Claiborne, LA; Webster, LA
